scenario_text.value:
(We repelled the enemy, but...
we still don’t know if it’s safe here.)

(And we also don’t know what there is ahead.
Should I go check it out...?)
Let’s keep it up a bit longer.

Yeah, yeah, I hear you.
I thought you’d say that!

Yo, more of them are heading this way!
They’ll reach us soon!

I didn’t expect this many enemies in a place
like this. There must be something up ahead.

That feeling—the one that makes me tremble—
it’s getting stronger!

Could the enemy’s original goal be here, and
we just happened to be in the way of it?
No time to think about it! Here they come!
